desc: Lumina Data Platform - On Data Engineering side, working on a data pipeline to analyze memory wastage on the cluster. On the Gen AI side, working on changes and features to a LLM-based migration service for legacy languages (COBOL, SAS, etc.)

Mission Operation & Controls Dashboard - used for satellite communication and job automation. A recent initiative developed was a script to automate the ground station antenna by predicting the satellite passover location.
Returned to design and implement new microservice for Candidate Referral Program
Migration from legacy Angular codebase into React
